website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty tape measure has some nice features, but  also has a few minor flaws.
pros: Magnetic hook is strong and useful
cons: Tape measure is a bit heavy
Metric measurements are difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: not a 2 sided tape measure
customer_reviews.text: I went looking for a 2 sided measuring tape, thought this was it. Nope, not 2 sided, just one sided, even though the description says "BOTH SIDE RULER" , and there is a picture of the 2 sided tape. It's ok for a regular measuring tape with a magnetic end, but I already have 3 of them. Had to return it. Tried replying to an email from the company, but after 2 days, no response update..company let me know I got sent the old model, the fixed it right away..thanks
customer_reviews.author: spotty

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Broke on first use.  Tape won’t retract.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 6 months ago and it sat in my tool box until I went to use for something metric today. It broke immediately. Tape won’t retract. It’s rare that I’m this disappointed in the quality of a product. Complete junk. I have an imperial tape measure that I’ve been using for ten years and it’s still works like it did the first day. I have been ripped off!
customer_reviews.author: johnnynova

customer_reviews.title: Fell from heaven right into my hand.
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape is made by God himself. I ordered it because it got big ol' magnets and it got cm.... Raised in Germany so the imperial measurements is a pain in my .... Anyways on the bottom side it gives you illustration of the fractions what makes it easier to measure. No more guessing. The tape by itself is very stiff and holds up without bending down. The end tip with the magnets adjust well to push against or pull on measurements. Very well made and I think you won't find a better one here or in any hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Jomant

customer_reviews.title: Great for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Love the tape measure, the only thing that makes me crazy, the starting point on the tape has the magnetic clip on it, but it extends almost 2 inches up the tape, so if you need to read the measurement in those first couple inches, it’s a real pain!
customer_reviews.author: DC NW BASSIN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tape measure - if only it had auto lock
customer_reviews.text: I just got my 3-pack of these today and I am not returning them! They are amazingly solid and durable feeling. I love the dual-sided measures, the metric and English, and the very large (EZ to read) numbers. It is bigger than I expected. But my biggest disappointment is that there is no auto-lock -- you have to put your finger on the tape or hit the lock button to keep the tape from going back in. It does not have (nor does it need at all) an auto retract feature, but it retracts so easily and solidly, that really is not a demerit. Overall it is a very high-quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wow from a lady
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and I can read it without my glasses on which is wonderful. Made very well, not heavy or bulky to hold and as the information says it does not bend when pulling it straight out which is so handy when doing things myself. Awesome and worth the money, it saves on many aggravating circumstances 👍
customer_reviews.author: Chichigirl

customer_reviews.title: Not great for really exact measurements
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a shop class I was taking. It's sturdy, and the magnetic ends are nice, but the actual tape measure itself is off by about 1/16th of an inch. So if you will be doing really exact or precise measurements, or if you will be working with other people who have different brands of tape measures, maybe look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Glicker

customer_reviews.title: Great small business that cares about you!
customer_reviews.text: I searched hardware stores & could not find a measuring tape that had metric measurements...looked on Amazon & found exactly what I needed. This tape is going to Cuba to help a family that does construction...their current measuring tape only goes 3 meters, so this will be a huge improvement! Delivery was super fast & the product was well packaged! Thank you for such great survive!!
customer_reviews.author: kimi

customer_reviews.title: New to the trade and love this item
customer_reviews.text: I'm working on being an electrician and I'm doing a lot of layout. The guys I work with make fun of me for having a metric tape measure, but they'll be surprised when they need it one day. Joke is going to be on them. Strong, durable, and easy to read. The magnet surprised me on how well it holds, so make sure to not yank the tape measure because it may break off. Great item. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Hashimoto

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and silky tape measure, in both metric and imperial measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and silky tape measure. Love that it is in metric and imperial measurements. It also has the measurements on both sides of the tape measure. It has handy dandy reference points, and it's bright and easy to read. There is a magnet so you can attach it to metal things, such as a nail or screw to measure, or in a jiffy, you can use to to retrieve such items. It is 25 feet or 7.5 meters long. There is also a nice belt clip and strap so you can carry it with you and you won't drop it. The locking mechanism is very secure and fool proof.
customer_reviews.author: JVSGUSCASD

customer_reviews.title: Broke after maybe a couple of dozen uses the end piece broke right off
customer_reviews.text: Broke after maybe a couple of dozen uses the end piece broke right off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris U.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tape measure!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice tape measure. Feels solid. Locking mechanism works well. Love the magnetic tip. It is easier to read than the one I'm replacing. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: PseudoMe777

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to use for conversions
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tape measure 4 products that are in centimeters or millimeters that you want to convert to inches I use it mostly because Amazon and other markets that use centimeters or millimeters instead of inches it makes it easy to figure out what size you want
customer_reviews.author: jeremie carter

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Good measuring tape. Unfortunately my blade cracked right near the 1 inch mark, which makes it impossible to use. The chance of getting cut is very high so it will have to be replaced. For not using it that often, the fact it only lasted 2 years is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julian J.

customer_reviews.title: Best tape measure every
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure is one of the best that I have every used. This is easily the 30th tape measure I have purchased in the last 50 years. The markings on both-sides of the tape is so handy. You don't know until your using it and realize you aren't dancing with the tape to see the measurement. Very comfortable feel. Over all really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: markncathy@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Magnet holds tight.  Nice deluxe tape measure.
customer_reviews.text: Seems super sturdy. Love the dual side. Was skeptical about the magnet working so I tried it immediately and, yes! That baby holds tight! Compared to my previous long tape measure, a standard hardware store staple, this one is a big jump up in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Always Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Really good measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tape measure. The magnet is a bonus feature that is awesome. It has a good feature that shows how far apart studs should be when building say like a house. The casing has a nice feel and durable. The only reason my husband gave it 4 stars is because the centimeter measures should be a smaller font, seems to busy but he thinks it because he does use that part. He still thinks it a great tool. We bought two and has recommended it to his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tape, add self. locking mechanism for the five star rating
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dual measurement option and everything else about this tape. What I would have preferred though is a self locking mechanism for the tape. I. have grown accustomed to this from using another take from Makita, however it did not have the dual measurement option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gillett-Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love this tape measure
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and loved it. All of a sudden, I couldn't find it and thought I lost it at a robotics competition - I ended up buying another one (and found the original). Easy to read and great for going from metric to imperial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tape measure!!
customer_reviews.text: Update 01/11/2018 Best tape measure I own! Very sturdy and high quality. Best of all, great customer service that stands behind their warranty! Had a defect a year later and they replaced it for free. Outstanding! Great tape measure, has everything i need and more! Very well made, great price, love having both metric and imperial. The tape is sturdy enough to hold itself up to 7-8' where my previous Stanley tape measure buckles after 4'.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: if it was the thought that counts, this would be great
customer_reviews.text: I like the shock protection and the tape itself. Having increments on the bottom side is very useful. However, I don't like the fact that it has both metric and imperial on the same tape, it leads to confusion, and when trying to pull a measurement it only comes from one side, which can lead to inaccuracies. The magnets are a good idea, but since they're not flush with end of the tape, and pushing off of a small detent, it also makes it hard top be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Janik

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Has a good wait to and most of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Has a good wait to and most of the bells and whistles of a much more expensive tape measure. Magnets work well and having the markings of both sides of the tape comes in handy. It hasn't been dropped yet to test the protective case, but I will update this review over time if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin L

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I like building things and sometimes a project makes sense in imperial units, and other times metric. This tape measure makes it super easy to switch on the fly as needed. It has numbers on the top and bottom of the tape just in case one orientation is easier to read than another wherever you're working. I haven't needed the magnet on it yet, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: The magnets are garbage
customer_reviews.text: I thought the magnets were just a tacky gimmick but they are nice good magnets. There is a small issue with the metal hook moving which changes the preciseness of the measurement off by 2cm over.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Lock broke. It is hard cheap plastic plus the end piece moves a lot so unsure if accurate
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy, easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many tape measures. They are flimsy and floppy, hard to lock and eventually break. This tape measure is good quality, sturdy, easy to use and read. You get what you pay for and this case I got a little more:)
customer_reviews.author: Janice Asher

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tape Measure!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my old craftsman 25' tape that I've had for 30 years, The Kutir tape is the perfect replacement it is strong and extremely well made the magnet and the handle are also a nice touch something my old tape did not have.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 2 months with daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Since there are so many good measuring tape manufacturers out there I can't even say this would be OK for occasional use. I used it in a manufacturing plant for about two months before the magnet casing came loose and a chunk of the actual tape broke off making it sharp, cutting my finger several times and difficult to retract. Magnets were strong though. Think I'll stick with Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Eamon

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: it broke on the 3rd use. it wouldn't go back into the case, as i tried to push it back it just broke.
customer_reviews.author: mike watanabe

customer_reviews.title: ... tape measure for a couple weeks now and am happy with the quality and features it provides
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tape measure for a couple weeks now and am happy with the quality and features it provides. Since I am an American working overseas, I need to be able to relay metric and imperial dimensions to different people. This tape provides easy to read dimensions as well as many other options that make it useful on a dad to day basis. The only issues so far is that the edges are quite sharp and can cut your finger if you are trying to slow the blade from retracting too fast. Overall, I am please with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Tape measure
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't like it cause it was hard to read. He is old school and likes regular measurements. He also said that it was good and stiff and held up when it is pulled out a long way.
customer_reviews.author: C. siegler

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Solid tape measure. Cheaper than the competition but just as high quality. Already used this for a couple site visits I had to do for my job. The magnet is very strong and the tape measure itself is stiffer than the competition out there (i.e. FatMax). Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with nice features
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and heavy duty for a variety of uses. I like the clear bold markings for feet, the locking holds well and can be bent. I was worried that it wasn't Craftsman or Stanley, both of which I really like, but this is certainly just as good and in some ways better. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Having standard and metric is great, and having it on both sides is really nice to have. Magnetic hook is nice as well, especially when measuring walls. I'd love to see a 6 foot or so version of this, something more pocket size (maybe standard on one side and metric on the other).
customer_reviews.author: Time And Motion

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring tape!
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape works very good and seems to be well made. There are several reviews that claim the tape broke after a short time. These people leaving these reviews are obviously not using the tape measure properly. Any tape measure, no matter how expensive, cannot continuelsy be returned at full speed or it will break. If this tape measure is used properly like any tool it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Veronda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality and a bonus measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality, nice printing of dual scales and a BONUS cloth measuring tape that came with it for free - no strings attached! I feel they should advertise this in their listing! See photo.
customer_reviews.author: NauShek

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how accurate this is, because I didn't measure it against another. What is does is what it says it does. And very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Great tape measurer
customer_reviews.text: Great tape measurer! This is my first time buying a Kutir product and I can say I'm pleased. The tape measurer lived up to its' product description. Quality seems top notch. I bought it for woodworking so it was my fault for buying a 25'. It's a little big for my intended use. I could easily get by with a 12'. I would highly recommend this tape measurer and based on that I wouldn't hesitate to by other Kutir products.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Texas

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: A Fantastic Tape Measure. Bought a ~$35 DeWalt from HD but that didn't even have half the features this does. Returned that after verifying this Kutir was even better. Centimeters? It does it. So much easier to measure and communicate the measurements to someone else. Why the US is still measuring in Imperial is beyond many.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tape Measure!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's in Metric and Imperial on both sides of the tape. I also think the magnetic end will come in real handy in a lot of situations. The shipping was on schedule and this seems to be an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery D. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just bought recently after another cheaper brand stopped working. This seems much sturdier. Like that the numbers are easy to read and double sided.
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: Only buy to measure under 20'
customer_reviews.text: I thought the magnet would be helpful... Not so much. The magnet wasn't the worst part though. First time I accidentally took the tape all the way out it slips right out of the case and is now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tape measure
customer_reviews.text: I like this tape measure. I wanted to buy one that had english and metric, and this one does the trick. I like the reversable tape so I can read if I bend the tape over for an inside measurement. The magnets on the tab are very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good tape. Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good tape. Seems sturdy. I like this tape because I'll be using it out-of-the-country, where they use the metrics measurements. Having both the metrics and standard measurements used in the U.S., in one measuring tape, will help me in my conversion to metrics. Would have been great if the measurements were broken down more, to say, one-eighths.
customer_reviews.author: a3v

customer_reviews.title: ... being paid or have no idea on what a good messuring tape is
customer_reviews.text: Either the people writing these reviews are being paid or have no idea on what a good messuring tape is.. This tape measure is flimsy.. I pulled out 5 ft and broke.. Theres not a good protection coating on it, and so it started tearing. The numbers on the tape are confusing and clustered. Worst tape measure by far.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Waltrip

customer_reviews.title: good retention, when extended
customer_reviews.text: good retention, when extended. returns well so far, without sticking at all. bought for the combo metric/ imperial scales. feels good in the hands, maybe thats the rubberised cover? definitely a good value for me.
customer_reviews.author: OIS

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I only use it for home stuff not for like my job or construction work. But so far it has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni L.

customer_reviews.title: I have small hands and it fits nicely into my palm
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape is light-weight. It is smooth and the locking mechanism works perfectly. I have small hands and it fits nicely into my palm. I wish the metric units would read as 1.20m, 1.30m, 1.40m, etc. They read 120, 130, 140, etc. Other than that, it is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ive purchased yet. Others out there break after a few times of usage. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: choppy20000

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was very weary of buying this due to previous reviews. However both my husband and I were very impressed. I like the magnets at the end. To me it is very easy to read and precise measurements are easy to read. It seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Archaeological Tool
customer_reviews.text: This tape is flexible, easy to read, and the best tape measure out of the many Iʻve owned over the years.
customer_reviews.author: PunaluuG

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: Great measuring tape for the money. I loose mine all the time so I needed an extra one
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best tape measure I have ever owner for several reasons. Even if your tape measure is functional, treat yourself to nice upgrade. For $12 who can go wrong.....
customer_reviews.author: amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Bonus, it came with a flexable measuring tape also. The magnet end slides back and forth, initially was surprised but works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stempile

customer_reviews.title: what great quality
customer_reviews.text: never heard of the brand, and usually pick one of the name brands for this type of product, i.e. Stanley etc. BUT....I have to say, this is much better quality than anything i would expect and most of all, its better made than my previous Stanley which I lost/misplaced. The pull and close is very smooth and it has just a better control and quality. Give it a try and you will know.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Yang

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea, but showed up with a broken tape right out of the box. Really disappointed. Picture doesn’t do the wrinkle justice. It’s bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jason N.

customer_reviews.title: Good all purpose for the house
customer_reviews.text: The clip that prevents my old Craftsman tape measure from retracting no longer works. Time for a replacement and like this new purchase. Sturdy but also lightweight and compact. Perfect for me doing handy woman jobs around the house and yard. Appreciate that it has both US and metric capability and the magnets on the end are a nice bonus feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tape measure, better than ones I’ve bought at the large box stores
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rapini

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy! Not as heavy as Stanley Fat guy
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy! Not as heavy as Stanley Fat guy. The magnet tip turned out to be a great idea since I doing my measuring alone and can be quicker and more accurate with a magnet on the end. Also having metric system added to standard adds to its value. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: miguel angel

customer_reviews.title: DAD LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed both sides with a bunch of details for precise measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Best Tape Measure I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Solid, reliable, strong, convenient. Great tool and the only tape measure you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Blaise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all, very durable and should last me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the handiest with measuring tapes and I found this to be so easy to use. The magnets make a huge difference for me. The numbers are easy to read from a distance and having both sides of the tape marked is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate cheap made clip
customer_reviews.text: The end clip is very loose moves about 1/8 to 3/16 inch
customer_reviews.author: WTFeeders

customer_reviews.title: Well made measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and will use it for everyday household measuring. It is a bit bulky, and probably made for professional use. My old measuring tape stopped retracting and this one looked like it would last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: linda prince

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable product. Cant roll nack just after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Something wrong with this tape. I see the tape cant roll back anymore. Infact i got a small cut on finger to push that in. I should have gone for standard one
customer_reviews.author: santosh

customer_reviews.title: This is the best measure tape you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best measure tape you can buy. Best price and best quality with all handy useable features. Most of the big brands they don't have this much of feature and they are expensive. Try this you will be so much happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, it's easy to read and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Solid action
customer_reviews.text: Like the double sided tape. The locking your goodness and works great. Very solid. I’m not sure I will use the anti-shock covering but it’s nice to have. Are used to buy a very cheap tape measures but no more.
customer_reviews.author: WDF

customer_reviews.title: Very durable product
customer_reviews.text: I only paid for one construction measuring tape; however I was provided with a regular measuring tape as well. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Buggs

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and high quality. This tape measurer will probably outlive me. Seller is extremely nice, had followup messages making sure i had my product/enjoyed it. Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kwon

customer_reviews.title: easy to read tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Very wide, strong, easy to read tape measure! My old one was 40 years old! and bent and twisted and rusted... my new one extends out with no problem. Great but to boot
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lauffer

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and Trust Tape Measure. This measuring tape works well and the Trust measuring tape is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. It's well balanced and feels really nice in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It's well balanced and feels really nice in the hand. The tape markings are large and easy to read (For my old eyes I need that). Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen J. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: All the measurements
customer_reviews.text: excellent- easy to read and use and very nicely highlighted numbers on the ruler on both sides, informational also re; measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I love the markings on both sides
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my current tape measure would no longer hold the extended tape firmly--it has a rocker type of hold, while this has a much more secure, slider type of hold. I love the markings on both sides, as well as the magnetic tape end.
customer_reviews.author: David Butler

customer_reviews.title: Metric and SAE shown on tape.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son-in-law from Ukraine. He uses it all the time and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: cwhepkat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! well made and stays sturdy up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! well made and stays sturdy up to 8' very nice and rolls n nice also powerful magnet very powerful magnet for the size of it.Comfortable grip as well.Fast delivery too.Recomend
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: very good product - but get a knife to free it from the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The tape measure is a solid workhorse. No complaints. To the folks at Kutir, go easy on the impenetrable packaging. We shouldn't need a pruning shears and a scalpel to free the item from the plastic. Save yourselves some money and your customers some frustration and put it in a simple, small cardboard box. We'll love you more for it.
customer_reviews.author: robert A york

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the magnet at the tip of the measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: KetchupBottle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tape measure. The magnetic hook works as described. I appreciate the flexibility of the tape, and having the measurements on the underside of the tape allows to make measurements that would otherwise be awkward or impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: dharwin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tape! With the metric and imperil measurements on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tape! With the metric and imperil measurements on both sides of the tape make it much-easier to use! The tape was delivered on time and packed with great care!
customer_reviews.author: Reginal A. Hay Jr.

customer_reviews.title: nice Tape measure have used it a week now and ...
customer_reviews.text: nice Tape measure have used it a week now and seems to holding up nicely. I especially like the dual metric/imperial measures on the tape as I frequently use both.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape Measure!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure works great!! I work in the x-ray field and I am always using metric and standard measurement. This tape measure allows me to get my measurements quickly without having to do conversations on my calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and I will feel good about giving it
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape was bought for a gift. It is sturdy and I will feel good about giving it. Being able to read it easier than a regular tape is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy, accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, accurate, and reliable-rewind tape measure. It arrived sooner than I expected and was very well packaged. I would not hestitate to buy another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Slim2u

customer_reviews.title: I can measured in a vacant place or not.
customer_reviews.text: When you buy things, I can install them in a vacant place or measure them.
customer_reviews.author: Takeshi Kajita

customer_reviews.title: The magnet at the very end is great for my fabrication job
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this tape measure is a plus. It has standard and metric measuring abilities. The magnet at the very end is great for my fabrication job. Also, the fine increments of measuring assure the accuracy I need to do my job near perfection. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well designed and works well. The double-sided markers are the welcome addition over other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: BBB555

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. Cheaply made and weak magnet. You can get a fatmax or a Milwaukee tape for around the same price at a much higher quality. Do not recommend this tape.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, delivered on time Nice to have numbers on the bottom for working overhead , crown molding , light installations etc etc
customer_reviews.author: ncman424

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: Great measuring tape! Easy to read numbers, easy to handle. Fast shipping, great seller! Could not be happier with purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Seymourstreet

customer_reviews.title: and yes it's easy to read in both metric and imperial markings
customer_reviews.text: Big solid tape measure, and yes it's easy to read in both metric and imperial markings. I bought it for my workshop and wish it was smaller but being 25 footer, I should have known it was going to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be great quality, and yes it is magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Lol I received an email from the company "Kutir" (I suppose) wanting me to leave a review so here it is. Seems to be great quality, and yes it is magnetic. Only time will tell how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great tape measurer
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a tape measurer here with metric readings. This one is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This has been one of the best Measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best Measuring tape. It makes it easier to read on both sides and robust to the max. We recommend all warehouses to order it. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: All Green Building Products

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy well thought out tape measures. I haven't had a chance to use them yet but I am looking forward to the time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected...
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleasantly surprised. Attention to detail is superb on this tape measure. Rugged construction and consistent smooth action on the rewind. I love the matte finish vs the usual "shiny" tape. The tape lock is also consistent and stable (a must).
customer_reviews.author: Superoleo

customer_reviews.title: Light duty use
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tape measure with good features. The plastic and overall build feel a little light, so I keep it in my truck for estimates. Not sure how long it would hold up to daily field useage or a decent drop. Hence the 4 stars. The value is in line with the cost paid.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hensley

product_meta.title: Measuring Tape Measure By Kutir - EASY TO READ 25 Foot BOTH SIDE DUAL RULER, Retractable, STURDY, Heavy Duty, MAGNETIC HOOK, Metric, Inches and Imperial Measurement, SHOCK ABSORBENT Solid Rubber Case
feature_bullets: ✔ 7 FEET STAND OUT MADE MEASURING EASY: With a sturdy matte blade measuring 0.15mm thick stand out till 7 FEET, this 25 foot tape measure is strong and durable, making it an essential for everyone from everyday homeowners, interior designers to professional handyman, carpenter, metal or wood workers and architects.

✔ ACCIDENTAL DROP PROTECTED WITH SHOCK-ABSORBENT CASE: The casing of our retractable measuring tape is made out of a top grade rubberized material that is conveniently shock-absorbent. It has even been tested for quality assurance purposes in our labs.

✔ WORKING ALONE BECAME EASIER WITH MAGNETIC HOOK: The end of the measuring tape is outfitted with a powerful magnet, allowing you to get a proper measurement without all the fuss. Simply attach the end of the ruler to any metal surface to keep it in place while you get the measurements you need.

✔ EASY TO READ BOLD NUMBERS: Thanks to the measurement indicators on the measurement tape, Bold Easy To Read Large Numbers, our measuring tool provides accurate measurements for carpenters, builders, hobbyists and more. Measurement is better then MID II also been awarded certification from M.I.D for accuracy. You have both inch and metric ruler to perform all type of works.

✔ BUY MORE SAVE MORE - We love our customers and want them to love us too. If you buy 2 or more of our measuring tapes you will save (Check Below in Special Offer Section). This is wonderful gift for mens, Buy for a friend or loved one and save together.
